volunteer_experience.info:
ABU Robocon competition encourages us to build different robots with different mechanisms every year from scratch involving contributions from all fields of engineering. This demands preparation, work, and testing to be carried out for at least 10 months a year. We not only get a golden opportunity to put their smarts in the various fields of engineering to use but also learn how to manage a project of this size and work in a team to compete against the best and brightest students from acrossâ€¦
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          ABU Robocon competition encourages us to build different robots with different mechanisms every year from scratch involving contributions from all fields of engineering. This demands preparation, work, and testing to be carried out for at least 10 months a year. We not only get a golden opportunity to put their smarts in the various fields of engineering to use but also learn how to manage a project of this size and work in a team to compete against the best and brightest students from across India.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

volunteer_experience.info: It is a non-profit initiative by the students of NIT Durgapur to impart basic formal education to underprivileged children required for the lifetime, acquired during formative years.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Bihari More Education Project
volunteer_experience.title: Student Teacher

volunteer_experience.info: The Electronics & Communication Engineering Studentsâ€™ Society (ECESS), NIT Durgapur is a non - profit society led by the students of Department of Electronics & Communication Engineering. The society is formed to make the students understand and develop professional and technical skills to meet the growing industrial challenges.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: ECE Student's Society, NIT Durgapur
volunteer_experience.title: Technical Team Head

volunteer_experience.info: The Indian Society for Technical Education(ISTE) is the leading National Professional non-profit making Society for the Technical Education System in our country with the motto of Career Development of Teachers and Personality Development of Students and overall development of our Technical Education System operating in association with All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and other International Projects.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Indian Society for Technical Education, NITC Students' Chapter
volunteer_experience.title: Executive Member

projects.title: 8-bit Computer
projects.description: Inspired by books on Digital Computer Electronics by Malvino and Brown and Digital Logic and Computer Design by M. Morris Mano.

projects.title: Document Scanner Using OpenCV
projects.description: Inspired by CamScanner. Applied Gaussian Blur to smoothen the image followed by Canny Edge detection to detect all the edges and Finding the boundary of the page using contours. Finally applied Perspective transforms for mapping, resulting in the top view with scanned effect.

projects.title: RISC 32-bit MIPS Processor
projects.description: MIPS:- Microprocessor without Interlocked Pipelined Stages is a 32 bit RISC ISA. In this project, I have implemented a 5 stage Pipelined Processor processing various instructions at a single clock cycle. Only a small set of instructions is implemented. Please visit the GitHub page to know more.

projects.title: Arduino Self-Balancing Robot
projects.description: A small robot based on the Arduino Uno and the MPU6050 accelerometer-gyroscope module connected by an I2C bus. The Kalman Filter has been implemented and tested to fuse data from a gyroscope and an accelerometer. Further PID controller has been implemented to enable the robot to stay upright.
